speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: Everything hurts and I’m dying.

speaker: Ron Swanson
quote: There’s only one thing I hate more than lying: skim milk. Which is water that is lying about being milk.

speaker: April Ludgate
quote: Time is money; Money is power; Power is pizza; Pizza is knowledge. Let’s go!

speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: I am a goddess a glorious female warrior.

speaker: Andy Dwyer
quote: Just remember every time you look up at the moon I too will be looking at a moon. Not the same moon obviously. That’s impossible.

speaker: Tom Haverford
quote: Sometimes you gotta work a little so you can ball a lot.

speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: We have to remember what’s important in life: friends waffles and work. Or waffles friends work. But work has to come third.

speaker: Chris Traeger
quote: If I keep my body moving and my mind occupied at all times I will avoid falling into a bottomless pit of despair.

speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: What I hear when I’m being yelled at is people caring really loudly at me.

speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: Do you think that marrying penguins made some kind of statement?

speaker: Andy Dwyer
quote: I’m fine. It’s just that life is pointless and nothing matters and I’m always tired.

speaker: Chris Traeger
quote: I think you’ve got several options. They’re all terrible… but you have them.

speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: I’m big enough to admit that I am often inspired by myself.

speaker: Ron Swanson
quote: My first ex-wife’s name is Tammy. My second ex-wife’s name is Tammy. My Mom’s name is Tamara… she goes by Tammy.

speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: No matter what I do literally nothing bad can happen to me. I’m like a white male U.S. Senator.

speaker: Craig Middlebrooks
quote: These dogs are so cute I want to throw up and kill myself.

speaker: Kipp Bunthart
quote: Can we have ONE conversation about feminism where MEN get to be in charge?

speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: I stand behind my decision to avoid salad and other disgusting things.

speaker: Andy Dwyer
quote: His name is Champion because he’s the dog world champion.

speaker: Ann Perkins
quote: When Andy and I used to go the movies he would always try to guess the ending of the movie. And he would always guess that the main character had been dead the whole time. Even when we saw Ratatouille.

quote: It’s like I always say. When life gives you lemons you sell some of your grandma’s jewelry and go clubbing.

speaker: Leslie Knope
quote: I ate a brownie once at a party in college. It was intense. It was kind of indescribable actually. I felt like I was floating. Turns out there wasn’t any pot in the brownie it was just an insanely good brownie.

quote: Do I look like I drink water?

quote: This is so awesome. We are like Robin Hood. We steal from the club and give to ourselves.

quote: Jogging is the worst. I know it keeps you healthy but God at what cost?

quote: Oh my god! (catches calculator) Hey Dr. Buttons! I mean my old calculator. It doesn’t have a name.

quote: If I had to have anybody tell me that I have cancer I would want it to be me.

quote: I know what things are.

quote: Ugh. I hate talking to people about things.

quote: Calzones are pointless. They’re just pizza that’s harder to eat. No one likes them.
